Credits

Wax is a minimal computing (minicomp) project led by Marii Nyröp. The project is currently maintained by Marii Nyröp and Alex Gil. It relies on Jekyll, IIIF, Leaflet IIIF, Rake, ElasticLunr, and IIIF_S3. Wax builds upon work by Peter Binkley, David Newbury, and Alex Gil.

We welcome and encourage contributors and maintainers. Please get in touch, or fork the project on GitHub. If you encounter any issue with the software, please create an issue on our repository.

For more about Wax’s specs, visit the documentation.
